function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Live-location tracking of patients","Impact":"Privacy invasion and data security risk","Mitigation":"Anonymization of data, strict access control, and data encryption","Technologies":"Anonymization tools, access control systems, encryption algorithms","People":"Patients in quarantine","Owner":"Department of health and relevant government agencies"},{"Description":"Contact tracing and sharing location history and contacts","Impact":"Privacy invasion and data security risk","Mitigation":"Anonymization of data, user consent for data sharing, and data encryption","Technologies":"Anonymization tools, consent management systems, encryption algorithms","People":"Users of the app","Owner":"Government authorities and health organizations"},{"Description":"Proximity tracking and real-time dashboard of COVID-19 cases","Impact":"Privacy invasion and data security risk","Mitigation":"Anonymization of data, strict access control, and data encryption","Technologies":"Anonymization tools, access control systems, encryption algorithms","People":"Users of the app","Owner":"Government agencies"}]}
